column5: PBR Just to be clear the judge of their Supreme Court revoked his block of the sale of TAG so this will no longer need to be decided on the 12th In short Petrobras is now free and clear of any further issues in front of Brazila Supreme Court blue skies for asset sales Next major step and a critical one with much upside is next weeks Social Security reform measure which may be presented on Monday or Tuesday in its final form A stronger than expected package will have significant positive moves on the market next week
